baron.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a man who is a member of a low rank of the British nobility or of a rank of European nobility
baron.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a businessman with a lot of power or influence
baron.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a business person who is in charge of a large industrial or financial organization
baron.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a powerful criminal who is in charge of a large group of drug producers or smugglers
baron.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: A British-born drugs baron was jailed for 15 years yesterday.
